description: Detects the execution of whoami with suspicious parents or parameters Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
name: Whoami Execution Anomaly
query: ((((process.executable:*\\whoami.exe AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe)))) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ Monitoring\ Agent\\Agent\\MonitoringHost.exe" OR "")))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:process.parent.executable))) OR process.command_line:(*whoami\ \-all* OR *whoami\ \/all* OR *whoami.exe\ \-all* OR *whoami.exe\ \/all*))
